title: what would be the best champion?
body: Suppose there was a game mode where you choose the champion you would like but without his abilities and passive and then gets to choose a passive for him out of the pool of all champion passives and then choose 3 different abilities for him out of the pool of all non-ult champion abilities and then choose an ult for him out of the pool of all the champion ult abilities. what combination would you choose and why?

replies.body: taric with eves passive, q - morde's mace of spades, w- jax's empower, e- fizz's playful trickster,ult- kassadin's rift walk.
